features.subtitle: Powerful tools designed for any business that runs on appointments.
features.calendar.title: Smart Calendar
features.calendar.desc: Create and manage events with day, week, and month views. Stay on top of your schedule effortlessly.
features.contacts.title: Contact Management
features.contacts.desc: Organize clients, import and categorize contacts. Keep your professional network at your fingertips.
features.notifications.title: Real-time Notifications

features.recurrence.title: Recurring Events
features.recurrence.desc: Complex recurrence patterns — daily, weekly, monthly. Perfect for repeating classes and sessions.
features.email.title: Email Invitations
features.email.desc: Send event invitations directly from the platform. Make it easy for clients to confirm attendance.
